rank: #2 in Colleges with the Best Professors in America
description:
editorial
Harvard is an elite private university located in Cambridge, Massachusetts in the Boston Area. It is a mid-size institution with an enrollment of 7,516 undergraduate students. Admissions is extremely competitive as the Harvard acceptance rate is only 3%. Popular majors include Social Science Research Methods, Economics, and Computer Science. Graduating 98% of students, Harvard alumni go on to earn a starting salary of $70,300.
